string.text: This sucks, I do not have a first aid kit or a bandage.
Thank you brother. I won't forget you helped me.
Sorry, there is nothing I can do.
How can you walk anywhere in the Zone like that? You've caught some kind of infection and can't heal yourself.
Heh, so who are you? Excuse me, but I can't give anything away. Then I'll me needing.
That is your business, but I do not think it does you honor.
